message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. If you buy it, I'll also include a free inspection report that will reveal its quality to you. This way, you'll know exactly what you're getting.
I'll buy the product, but only if I get the free inspection report. I want to know its quality before making a final decision.

I understand your concern about the inspection report. For this next product, I'm willing to offer a'satisfaction guarantee'. If you buy it and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund. However, if it's high-quality, you'll pay the full $100. This way, you'll have the opportunity to try the product without risking any financial loss.
I'm not interested in the satisfaction guarantee. I'd rather rely on my own judgment and wait for the inspection report to be sure of the product's quality.

I understand you're cautious. Given that you passed on the previous offer, I'm willing to make a concession. I'll sell this product to you for $80, which is a 20% discount from the original price. This way, you'll get a good deal on a product that might still meet your needs, even if it's not high-quality.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price. I'd rather wait for the next round and hope to get a high-quality product.

I've got a high-quality product for you! Given your previous hesitation to buy a low-quality product, I'm willing to offer a compromise. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll give you an additional product of your choice from a future round. This way, you'll get a great deal on a high-quality product and have the opportunity to get another product that suits your needs.

If you get another low-quality product in a future round, you can use this card to get a full refund on that product. This way, you'll have some protection against another low-quality product.
